price: Kung sakaling niloloob Namin ay ginawa sana Namin iyon na maalat, kaya bakit kaya hindi kayo nagpapasalamat?
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
